answers.answer: I am sorry I do not know of any reasons why this would be happining to you.  I do know that hormones can raise your body temperature.  Could there possibly be some other issues going on?  What kind of injection did your doctor give you?  Just be careful of other medicines because they can react to your insulin or make you more insulin resistant.  I would suggest seeing an endocronologist if you do not already and discuss the issues you are having.  Coould this possibly be a reaction to stress after finding out you have diabetes?  Stress can cause many strange things to happen.
